welcome_message_body: Welcome to Palm Bay, where the sun always shines and the hospitality is endless! Explore our beautiful beaches, vibrant wildlife, and charming downtown area as you immerse yourself in all the city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Vero Beach Municipal Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Vero Beach Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.
